channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: Here‚Äôs how to reorder browser tabs with Chromebook keyboard shortcuts once this feature arrives. No more mouse or trackpad needed! https://t.co/9mcDqo8Ilk
Excellent resource for JS array manipulation. https://t.co/WBNgHJuXG9
In a different context, something like this might almost be funny. Instead, it‚Äôs truly sad. https://t.co/EwwvVsyo27

Bike ride to the lake for some kayaking. Gorgeous day! https://t.co/lhH3mRDAjj
Somebody pooped out and needed a tow. üôÑ https://t.co/P36O3zS8Dw
I just sent the free, weekly About Chromebooks newsletter to thousands of passionate Chromies. If you're one of those but not a subscriber, here's your golden ticket: https://t.co/CKagN9ehNV

So tired of (and sore from) the lame stock shocks on the Honda PCX. New YSS gear on the way! https://t.co/lsBSPQ0puV
I also got this battery powered air compressor yesterday. Works great on the üèç tires, is handheld, USB C rechargeable and easy to tote along on rides. üëçüèª https://t.co/d30NJMFB88

@mathewinvisitec Looks like it has; I don't see it on Chrome OS 102 and I assume you're on v.100. For Chromebook help: https://t.co/yG7icS9tYm What's new is here but hasn't been updated in quite a while: https://t.co/PNfsMv0CkK)
